solution_line_template: Everyday, the three siblings drink {theo_cups_per_day} + {mason_cups_per_day} + {roxy_cups_per_day} = <<{theo_cups_per_day}+{mason_cups_per_day}+{roxy_cups_per_day}={daily_total_cups}>>{daily_total_cups} cups of water.
In one week, they drink a total of {daily_total_cups} x {days_in_week} = <<{daily_total_cups}*{days_in_week}={weekly_total_cups}>>{weekly_total_cups} cups of water.
